name: Formake
short_description:
Formake is a suite of tools for constructing and configuring well formed Makefiles. It allows constructing configurable and portable build system for source package.

Also it provides "Makefile From Scratch" manual that gives step by step instructions for designing correct Makefiles for particular cases.

No autogenerated scripts are produced. All scripts are well formed for human reading and shipping with source package.
No overbloat seen in autotools. Just simple Makefiles and configure system around them.
summary: Suite of tools for constructing and configuring Makefiles
